description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76055-THYMUS: Resection.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_INTEGRITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Integrity.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Intact


Fragmented


Single intact specimen (margins can be evaluated)


Multiple designated specimens (e.g., main excision and identified margins)


Fragmented (margins cannot be evaluated with certainty)


Morcellated hysterectomy specimen


Intact hysterectomy specimen


Disrupted


Indeterminate


Other


Not specified

columns.name: SPECIMEN_WEIGHT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Weight.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_GREAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Greatest Size.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Tumor Size.

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: DIST_FROM_MARGIN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Distance From Closest Margin.

columns.name: TREATMENT_EFFECT_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Treatment Effect.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not identified


No prior treatment


Not applicable


Present


No definite response identified (grade 3, poor/no response; extensive residual tumor)


No definite response identified (grade 3, poor or no response)


Greater than 10% residual viable tumor


Less than 10% residual viable tumor


Greater than 50% residual viable tumor


Less than 50% residual viable tumor


No definite or minimal response identified (poor or no response)


Marked response (minimal residual cancer)


No known presurgical therapy


No definite response to presurgical therapy


Probable or definite response to presurgical therapy


Cannot be determined


Indeterminate


Not known

columns.name: VIABLE_TMR_PERCENT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Residual Viable Tumor Percentage.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_OTHER_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other specimen.

columns.name: DISTNT_METASTASIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Distant Metastasis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not applicable


cM0 (i+): No clinical or radiographic evidence of distant metastasis


pM0: No distant metastasis


pM1: Distant metastasis


pM1a: Intraperitoneal metastasis beyond the right lower quadrant, including pseudomyx


pM1b: Nonperitoneal metastasis


pM1: Distant detectable metastasis as determined by classic clinical


pM1 (IVB): Distant metastasis


pM1a: Separate tumor nodule(s) in contralateral lung; tumor with pleural nodules or


pM1b: Distant metastases outside the lung / pleura


pM1: Distant metastasis (documented in this specimen)


pM1a: Metastasis in skin, subcutaneous tissues, or distant lymph nodes


pM1b: Metastasis to lung


pM1c: Metastasis to all other visceral sites or distant metastasis at any site


pM1a: Nonregional lymph node(s)


pM1b: Bone(s)


pM1c: Other site(s) with or without bone disease


pM1: Metastasis to sites other than CNS


pM1a: Single lesion


pM1b: Multiple lesions


pM1c: CNS metastasis


pM1d: Discrete mass(es) without leptomeningeal and / or CSF involvement


pM1e: Leptomeningeal and / or CSF involvement


pM1a: Non-regional lymph nodes or pulmonary metastasis


pM1b: Distant metastasis other than to nonregional lymph nodes and lungs


pM1a (III): Tumor extends to the lungs with or without genital tract involvement


pM1b (IV): Tumor involves other metastatic sites


pM1a: Largest diameter of the largest metastasis 3 cm or less


pM1b: Largest diameter of the largest metastasis 3.1-8.0 cm


pM1c: Largest diameter of the largest metastasis 8 cm or more


pM1a: Lung


pM1b: Metastasis involving distant sites other than lung (including skip metastases)


Distant Metastasis present (includes metastasis to lymph nodes)

columns.name: DSTNT_METASTATIS_ST
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Distant Metastatis Sites.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: TMR_EXTENSION_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Tumor Extension.

columns.name: MRG_IVLV_TM_SPEC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify site for Margins Involved by Tumor.

columns.name: STAGE_THYMOMA_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Stage Thymoma.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Thymoma


Thymic carcinoma

columns.name: PATH_STAGE_THYM_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Pathologic Staging for Thymomas (Modified Masaoka Stage).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Stage I: Grossly and microscopically encapsulated


Stage IIa: Microscopic transcapsular invasion


Stage IIb: Macroscopic capsular invasion


Stage III: Macroscopic invasion of neighboring organs


Stage IVa: Pleural or pericardial dissemination


Stage IVb: Hematogenous or lymphatic dissemination


Cannot be determined

columns.name: IMP_DIST_META_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Implants / Distant Metastasis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cannot be assessed


Not identified


Present

columns.name: IMP_DIST_SITE_OTH
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Implants / Distant Metastasis Present - Specify Other.

columns.name: IMMUNO_STAINS_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Immunohistochemical Stains.

columns.name: LYMPH_ND_NUM_XMD
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the number of lymph nodes examined.

columns.name: LYM_ND_NUM_IVLV
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify number of lymph nodes involved.

columns.name: LYMP_NODE_NON_PN_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Lymph Nodes category when not using Regional Lymph Nodes (pN) notation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cannot be assessed


No regional lymph node metastases


Regional lymph node metastasis

columns.name: PT_THYMIC_CARC_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Primary Tumor (pT) for Thymic Carcinomas.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


pTX: Primary tumor cannot be assessed


pT0: No evidence of primary tumor


pT1: Tumor completely encapsulated


pT2: Tumor invades pericapsular connective tissue


pT3: Tumor invades neighbors, such as pericardium, mediastinal pleura, thoracic wall


pT4: Tumor with pleural or pericardial dissemination

columns.name: REG_LYM_THYM_CARC_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Regional Lymph Nodes (pN) for Thymic Carcinomas.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


pNX: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed


pN0: No regional lymph node metastases


pN1: Metastasis in anterior mediastinal lymph nodes


pN2: Metastasis in other intrathoracic lymph nodes excluding ant mediastinal lym node


pN3: Metastasis in scalene and / or supraclavicular lymph nodes

columns.name: HIST_TYP_THYM_OTHER
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Type - Specify Thymoma.

columns.name: HIST_TYP_THYMIC_OTH
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Type - Specify Thymic carcinoma.

columns.name: TUMOR_EXT_LUNG_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Extension - Specify Lobes of Lung.

columns.name: TUMOR_EXT_PLEURA
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Extension - Specify Pleura Location.
